1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey is giving Rachel, Chandler, Phoebe, and Ross their bills.

lines.Line:
Okay Rach, that muffin and espresso, $4.50. Ross, double latte, $2.75.
Chandler, coffee and a scone, $4.25. And Pheebs, herbal tea, $1.25. So, all together
that’s (pauses to figure the total) $12.75

This coming from the man who couldn’t split our 80 dollar phone
bill in half
How much do I owe you for the muffin and the latte
Oh that’s on the house courtesy of Joey Tribbiani

Oh great! Well, tell him thanks. And since uh, Joey seems like such a
nice guy, maybe we could go on a date sometime

Well, he’s not used to women being so forward with him; but uh, I
good check with him—He says it’s okay. (She hands him her card.) Great! Thanks!
Bye-bye
Hey Joey, how come our stuff isn’t free
Hey Joey, how come our stuff isn’t free
Hey Joey, how come our stuff isn’t free

It will be when you look like that in a tight skirt! This is great!
I’m getting more dates than ever

Wait a minute, you’re only giving free stuff away to the pretty
girls
Yeah Joey that is so gross
Yeah Joey that is so gross
How about a scone on the house baby
How about a scone on the house baby

2.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey is working as Phoebe and Ross are sitting on the couch.

lines.Line: (to a customer) Are you all finished here
Great! (Joey takes his cookie and finishes it.

Okay, here are the tips for this morning. Jen gets 50, 50 for me, and
Joey owes eight dollars
For all the free food you gave away
Well if it’s free food, how come you’re charging me for it

We don’t give anything away unless it’s someone’s
birthday
Well, what if they came in third in a modeling contest
Well, what if they came in third in a modeling contest

(to a woman who came in third in a modeling contest) Sorry! (He grabs her
muffin away and returns it to the serving tray.

(entering, carrying a bunch of shopping bags) I just had the hardest day.
Those bags are so heavy. (Sets them down.

Jill, how did you pay for all this? I thought your dad took away your
credit card

Oh please, I memorized those numbers when I was 15. But look at all the
cool make-it-on-my-own stuff I got! (Holds up a red sweater) This is my "Please, hire
me" sweater. (Holds up a pair of black pants) And these are my, "Don’t you
want to rent me this apartment?" pants.

I don’t think charging new clothes too your dad qualifies as making
it on your own

I don’t think charging new clothes too your dad qualifies as making
it on your own
Oh, Mr. Scientist has to get all technical
Seriously, I don’t Rachel’s gonna think it’s a good idea
So who made her queen of the world
So who made her queen of the world
(notices Jill’s bags) Jill! Did you shop?
No! They did! (Points to Phoebe and Ross

You went shopping?! What, and then you just came in here and paraded it
right under Jill’s nose when you know she’s trying to quit. Wow, you guys are
terrible

Oh well, all right, I got (Ross hands her a bag) (To Ross) thank you, I
got uh, this y’know "I want a job sweater." (Holds up the same sweater.
And, and then I got uh, these are apartment pants
Yeah, you never heard of them

No, of course, of course I’ve heard of them! Ross, what did you
get
Huh? Oh, I got this—(Holds up this pink frilly thing)—this
Yeah! Oh, I-I love this babies

(covers her eyes and starts crying) I’m sorry Rachel, I’m
sorry
Oh, come on! You think that’s gonna work on me?! I invented that

All right, it’s okay. One little setback is okay, just don’t
let it happen again, all right? Now since daddy paid for all this stuff, I should
take it all away. But I’m just gonna take the-the pajmena. (Ross hands it to her.)
And the uh, and the uh pants. Y’know what, I’m just gonna take it all away,
‘cause that way you’ll just really learn the lesson. Okay? All righty, I’m
gonna run a couple of errands and I will see you at dinner. (Leaves with all of
Jill’s stuff.
Yeah. Everything but, the little blue one. (Holds it up for her.
(gasps) That’s the best one! Oh my God, (hugs him) thank you so much
Oh my gosh, that was so lame. Like a pajmena could be a rug

Oh yeah, how about you and the, (mimics her fake cry) "I’m
sorry!
(hits him) Shut up! I did not sound like that at all
(hits him) Shut up! I did not sound like that at all

What about, what about when I said y’know about the apartment
pants, how dumb was I
Were you this cute in high school

(gets up and sits between them) Okay-okay, why don’t I sit here and
you’ll both stop it

3.SceneDescription: Phoebe and Rachel's, Rachel is putting away her new clothes as Phoebe enters.

lines.Line: Umm, I think there’s something you should maybe know
Well, it’d better not be about the apartment pants, because I just pitched the idea to my boss at Ralph Lauren and she loved it

No. No. It’s just I was umm, I was with Ross and Jill after you
left and umm, I’m pretty sure I saw a little spark between them

Yeah I mean it’s probably nothing, but I just wanted to warn you
that there might be something there
With my sister Jill and my ex-boyfriend Ross

Oh my God! I can not believe that! I mean I don’t really like it
when Ross goes out with anyone, but my sister isn’t that like incest or something?!
Oh my God, and they’re gonna have sex! Oh! Oh no what if he marries her too?! Oh this
is just terrible, this is just terrible. And I can’t stop it! I can’t—I
don’t own Ross! Y’know? And Jill, she should be able to do whatever it is that
she wants to do! And oh my God, I can’t believe Ross is marrying my little sister,
this terrible. Oh my God, this is just the worst thing that could have ever happened to
me
But great news about the apartment pants, huh

4.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Chandler has fallen asleep reading a book. Monica calls
from the bedroom and wakes him up.

lines.Line:
Oh what is it honey, you need some tea? Some soup? (He gets up from
the couch and goes into the bedroom to find Monica, still in the robe, lying seductively
on the bed. Or at least she’s trying too and as he enters the room, she takes the
robe off on of her legs.) Oh-ohhhh
(trying to be seductive) Calling Dr. Big, Dr. Big to the bed
Oh Jeez honey, I thought, I thought you were asleep
Oh Jeez honey, I thought, I thought you were asleep
How could I be asleep knowing that you were in the next room

I was asleep. (She takes off her robe and starts to shiver) Oh no!
No-no honey! Y’know what’s sexy? Layers. Layers are sexy. And blankets are sexy.
And oh! Hot water bottles are sexy

Come on, get into bed! I want to prove to you that I’m not sick! I
wanna make you feel, as good as I feel. (Sneezes.)
Would you please get some rest
Would you please get some rest
Would you please get some rest

I’m fine. (She goes into one of those half sneezing, half-coughing
fits that you get with a bad cold or flu.

5.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Monica is still sick and is hobbling out into the living
room for some help from Chandler who’s on the couch reading.

lines.Line: Really? Struck down in the pribe of libe
Okay, fine I admit it! I feel terrible! Would you please rub this on my chest? (She hands him some of that Vicks Vap-O-Rub to put on.
No-no-no-no-no-no-no, you are not getting me this way
No-no-no-no-no-no-no, you are not getting me this way
Come on! I really need your help
Fine, I’ll rub it on myself
Fine, I’ll rub it on myself

lines.Character:
(To start this task, she lowers the top of her robe to reveal that she is naked from
the waist up, well at least her back is, and starts to rub on the gunk. Chandler notices
this, and has something start happening. I’ll let you fill in the blank here
lines.Line:
To start this task, she lowers the top of her robe to reveal that she is naked from
the waist up, well at least her back is, and starts to rub on the gunk. Chandler notices
this, and has something start happening. I’ll let you fill in the blank here.
So you’re just, kinda rubbing it on yourself
Are you kidding me?! Is this; is this turning you on
I can’t believe it! What is it? Is it the rubbing or the smell

It’s all very, very good. (She covers up and sits down.) So you
wanna go uh, mix it up
Oh come on you big faker
What happened to your rule about never sleeping with sick people
Well that was before all the vaporizing action
Well that was before all the vaporizing action
Okay, if you really wanna have sex

6.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Rachel enters and walks quickly over to the window to
watch Ross’s apartment. We see that Ross’s apartment is empty.

lines.Line: (calling from the bathroom) Is someone there
(calling from the bathroom) What are you doing here

Uh, I’m just, I’m just looking out your window. At-at the
view. What are you guys doing
We got some Vap-O-Rub in some places
We got some Vap-O-Rub in some places

lines.Character: (We see that Ross is returning to his apartment with Jill
lines.Line: We see that Ross is returning to his apartment with Jill.
(gasps) Oh, he brought her back to his apartment

(entering with Chandler) Who? (She looks out the window at Ross’s
apartment) Is that your sister
God, Ross is on a date with your sister! How weird is that?
Oh my God, look-look he’s taking off her clothes
Oh my God, look-look he’s taking off her clothes

lines.Character: (We see that Ross is taking off Jill’s coat
lines.Line: We see that Ross is taking off Jill’s coat.

Oh no it’s not, no it’s not. It’s a first date. I’m sure
that nothing is gonna…(as she is talking we see Ross close his drapes.

Ho-oh, he’s gonna get some! (Rachel looks at him.) Of the glare
from the streetlight out of his apartment. Y’know so umm, he’s closed the drapes
there so he can have a nice, pleasant conversation with your little sister. (Pause) Well,
I’m off to bed! (Goes to bed.
